snippet.title: LightlessTrailer
snippet.description:
Lightless: The 21st Sacrifice is a free to play classic adventure game on Steam and it's the first episode of an atmospheric horror game series set in 2018 Iran, Saqqez that tells the story of Navid, a writer who finally comes home, only to find himself strangled by a dark past that will not let go.

Play Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1305050/Lightless/
Developer: Bahman Aminipour
Publisher: Colubris Studios
